entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
